description.value:
You rig a snare to disorient a creature with a quick bash, leaving it with little ability to defend itself. The trap deals 6d6 bludgeoning damage to the first creature to enter its square; that creature must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:31] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature takes half damage and is off-guard for 1 round and stunned 1.

Failure The creature takes full damage and is off-guard for 1 round and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature takes double damage and is off-guard for 1 minute and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 4}.
